Title: Relates to establishing a two dollar surcharge on the purchase of sexually oriented media
Summary: Establishes a two dollar surcharge on the purchase of sexually oriented media; establishes the crime victims fund.
LawCode: Add ยง399-dddd, Gen Bus L; add ยง87, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing a two dollar surcharge on sexually oriented media; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the crime victims fund
